relevance_explanation: The routine only includes steps relevant to the customer. The customer has less than 30,000 loyalty points which means step 1a, "welcome them as a preferred client" was correctly pruned. The customer also has a fare that permits cancellation so the step to check if the policy does not allow cancellations was correctly pruned.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic, tools, and branches that apply to this customer were preserved in the trimmed routine, including tool calls check_cancellation_blockers, calculate_cancellation_fee, cancel_flight, issue_travel_credit and complete_case.
